about.heading: About Me
about.name: Name:

summaryText.item0: I'm a seasoned Frontend Developer with over 10 years of experience building high-quality, scalable, and user-centric websites and web services. My main expertise lies in React, and I have a strong background in modern JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, and responsive design.
summaryText.item1: Throughout my career, I've worked on a wide range of projects — from startups to enterprise systems — always focusing on clean code, maintainable architecture, and excellent user experience. I thrive in collaborative environments and continuously seek out new technologies and best practices to improve my skills.

goalsList.item0: Work on challenging and impactful projects

about.goalsText: I'm looking for a stable, long-term role where I can apply my skills, grow with the team, and make a real impact.

text.item0: Looking for an experienced frontend developer with strong UI/UX skills? You found him! Let's connect.
text.item1: Have you not seen my CV yet?
